dcterms:creator: David C. Van Essen
Stephen M. Smith
Deanna M. Barch
Timothy E. J. Behrens

Kamil Ugurbil
dcterms:description: The Human Connectome Project (HCP) Young Adult dataset provides diffusion-weighted imaging data for studying the human connectome, allowing for the reconstruction of neural pathways.
dcterms:title: Human Connectome Project (HCP) Young Adult dataset

dcterms:creator: Emmanuelle Renauld
Antoine Théberge
Laurent Petit
Jean-Christophe Houde
Maxime Descoteaux
dcterms:description: The ISMRM-2015 tractography challenge dataset consists of expert-curated white matter bundles used as ground truth for evaluating tractography algorithms.
dcterms:title: ISMRM-2015 tractography challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: Emmanuelle Renauld
Antoine Théberge
Laurent Petit
Jean-Christophe Houde
Maxime Descoteaux
dcterms:description: The ISMRM-sim dataset is an extension of the ISMRM-2015 dataset, consisting of simulated diffusion-weighted images with expert-curated white matter bundles for evaluating tractography models.
dcterms:title: ISMRM-sim dataset
